articles.author: Helen Collis
articles.title: Everyone wants Danish firm’s monkeypox jab (but supplies are limited) - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Bavarian Nordic is trying to work out how to fill new and existing orders from its stocks as it’s unable to manufacture any more doses this year.
articles.content:
A Danish biotech that until recently had just six customers for its monkeypox vaccine is now being inundated with orders  and is figuring out how to meet the demand.
Bavarian Nordics Imvanex is the … [+5183 chars]

articles.title: European Union will soon require common phone charger - CBC News
articles.description: European Union officials said they inked a provisional agreement Tuesday to require a standard USB Type-C charging cord in the 27-nation bloc. It's part of a wider effort to make products sold in the EU more sustainable and cut down on electronic waste.
articles.content:
Forget rummaging through the junk drawer. Soon, Europeans will only need to reach for one cable to charge their smartphones and other devices.
European Union officials said they inked a provisional … [+2943 chars]
